attributes.title: Terrible and dangerous app!
attributes.review:
Had a horrible experience. Do not download! 
To start off, I originally downloaded the app to keep up to date on rallies and current events, but I couldn‚Äôt believe how long it took to download! I was left staring at my screen for NO LESS THAN TWO DAYS. 
When it finally opened and I was filled with relief because I could finally support my favorite president, I was horrified to see that in the time it was downloading, all the personal data on my phone had been sucked into the Trump 2020 app and replaced by hundreds of viruses! Now my phone will not cooperate, is giving me strange popup messages every second, and glitches out constantly. In between all the glitching, the app also sexually harassed me and wouldn‚Äôt stop asking for my number (I don‚Äôt give that out to strangers; really disgusting that they would assume that). A huge warning also popped up warning me that if I was Mexican, they would hunt me down using my IP address and the FBI‚Äôs resources to deport me and my family. When I saw this, the love for my president and his tolerance for all races resurfaced, and I knew that everything would be okay.
While the next morning I thought that I could deal with these problems because I valued supporting my beloved president more than complaining about my issues, I soon realized that the damage was irreversible. I got a strange letter from the IRS in the afternoon and was accused of evading taxes. I would never do something like this, so I just KNEW it was the fault of this app!! I had no time to prepare or make any calls before I heard an insistent knocking on my door and an angry call of ‚ÄúPolice, open up!‚Äù 
No matter how much I begged and pleaded, i ended up in the cell where I am now. I depressingly asked my guards what I had done wrong for the sixth time, and they finally relented and told me that I was being treasonous because I didn‚Äôt turn on notifications for the Trump 2020 app. I am currently writing this review on the cold stone wall of my cell, knowing that I will never be able to leave and see the light of day ever again.

If you are okay with this horrible treatment, I fully advise that you download the app. If you would rather not end up a half-soul wretch like me, STAY AWAY!!
